verses.english: The LORD hear thee in the day of trouble; the name of the God of Jacob defend thee;

derivation: a primitive root;  also as denominative from H5331 (נֶצַח)
strongs_def: properly, to glitter from afar, i.e. to be eminent (as a superintendent, especially of the Temple services and its music); to be permanent
gloss: excel, chief musician (singer), oversee(-r), set forward.

strongs_def: properly, instrumental music; by implication, a poem set to notes
gloss: psalm.

derivation: rarely (fully); דָּוִיד; from the same as H1730 (דּוֹד); loving;
strongs_def: David, the youngest son of Jesse
gloss: David.

strongs_def: properly, to eye or (generally) to heed, i.e. pay attention; by implication, to respond; by extension to begin to speak; specifically to sing, shout, testify, announce
gloss: give account, afflict (by mistake for H6031 (עָנָה)), (cause to, give) answer, bring low (by mistake for H6031 (עָנָה)), cry, hear, Leannoth, lift up, say, [idiom] scholar, (give a) shout, sing (together by course), speak, testify, utter, (bear) witness. See also H1042 (בֵּית עֲנוֹת), H1043 (בֵּית עֲנָת).

strongs_def: Jehovah, Jewish national name of God
gloss: Jehovah, the Lord. Compare H3050 (יָהּ), H3069 (יְהֹוִה).

derivation: from an unused root meaning to be hot;
strongs_def: a day (as the warm hours), whether literal (from sunrise to sunset, or from one sunset to the next), or figurative (a space of time defined by an associated term), (often used adverb)
gloss: age, [phrase] always, [phrase] chronicals, continually(-ance), daily, ((birth-), each, to) day, (now a, two) days (agone), [phrase] elder, [idiom] end, [phrase] evening, [phrase] (for) ever(-lasting, -more), [idiom] full, life, as (so) long as (... live), (even) now, [phrase] old, [phrase] outlived, [phrase] perpetually, presently, [phrase] remaineth, [idiom] required, season, [idiom] since, space, then, (process of) time, [phrase] as at other times, [phrase] in trouble, weather, (as) when, (a, the, within a) while (that), [idiom] whole ([phrase] age), (full) year(-ly), [phrase] younger.

strongs_def: tightness (i.e. figuratively, trouble); transitively, a female rival:
gloss: adversary, adversity, affliction, anguish, distress, tribulation, trouble.

strongs_def: to be (causatively, make) lofty, especially inaccessible; by implication, safe, strong; used literally and figuratively
gloss: defend, exalt, be excellent, (be, set on) high, lofty, be safe, set up (on high), be too strong.

derivation: a primitive word (perhaps rather from through the idea of definite and conspicuous position; compare H8064 (שָׁמַיִם));
strongs_def: an appellation, as amark or memorial of individuality; by implication honor, authority, character
gloss: [phrase] base, (in-) fame(-ous), named(-d), renown, report.

strongs_def: gods in the ordinary sense; but specifically used (in the plural thus, especially with the article) of the supreme God; occasionally applied by way of deference to magistrates; and sometimes as a superlative
gloss: angels, [idiom] exceeding, God (gods) (-dess, -ly), [idiom] (very) great, judges, [idiom] mighty.

strongs_def: Jaakob, the Israelitish patriarch
gloss: Jacob.

verses.header: ¶ To the chief Musician, A Psalm of David.

verses.english: Send thee help from the sanctuary, and strengthen thee out of Zion;

strongs_def: to send away, for, or out (in a great variety of applications)
gloss: [idiom] any wise, appoint, bring (on the way), cast (away, out), conduct, [idiom] earnestly, forsake, give (up), grow long, lay, leave, let depart (down, go, loose), push away, put (away, forth, in, out), reach forth, send (away, forth, out), set, shoot (forth, out), sow, spread, stretch forth (out).

strongs_def: aid
gloss: help.

strongs_def: a sacred place or thing; rarely abstract, sanctity
gloss: consecrated (thing), dedicated (thing), hallowed (thing), holiness, ([idiom] most) holy ([idiom] day, portion, thing), saint, sanctuary.

derivation: the same (regularly) as H6725 (צִיּוּן)lemma צִיוּן missing dagesh, corrected to צִיּוּן;
strongs_def: Tsijon (as a permanent capital), a mountain of Jerusalem
gloss: Zion.

strongs_def: to suport (mostly figurative)
gloss: comfort, establish, hold up, refresh self, strengthen, be upholden.

verses.english: Remember all thy offerings, and accept thy burnt sacrifice; Selah.

derivation: a primitive root; also as denominative from H2145 (זָכָר)
strongs_def: properly, to mark (so as to be recognized), i.e. to remember; by implication, to mention;  to be male
gloss: [idiom] burn (incense), [idiom] earnestly, be male, (make) mention (of), be mindful, recount, record(-er), remember, make to be remembered, bring (call, come, keep, put) to (in) remembrance, [idiom] still, think on, [idiom] well.

strongs_def: properly, the whole; hence, all, any or every (in the singular only, but often in a plural sense)
gloss: (in) all (manner, (ye)), altogether, any (manner), enough, every (one, place, thing), howsoever, as many as, (no-) thing, ought, whatsoever, (the) whole, whoso(-ever).

derivation: from an unused root meaning to apportion, i.e. bestow;
strongs_def: a donation; euphemistically, tribute; specifically a sacrificial offering (usually bloodless and voluntary)
gloss: gift, oblation, (meat) offering, present, sacrifice.

derivation: or עוֹלָה; feminine active participle of H5927 (עָלָה);
strongs_def: a step or (collectively, stairs, as ascending); usually a holocaust (as going up in smoke)
gloss: ascent, burnt offering (sacrifice), go up to. See also H5766 (עֶוֶל).

derivation: a primitive root; also denominatively (from H1880 (דֶּשֶׁן))
strongs_def: to be fat; transitively, to fatten (or regard as fat); specifically to anoint; figuratively, to satisfy;  to remove (fat) ashes (of sacrifices)
gloss: accept, anoint, take away the (receive) ashes (from), make (wax) fat.

strongs_def: suspension (of music), i.e. pause
gloss: Selah.

verses.english: Grant thee according to thine own heart, and fulfil all thy counsel.

strongs_def: to give, used with greatest latitude of application (put, make, etc.)
gloss: add, apply, appoint, ascribe, assign, [idiom] avenge, [idiom] be (healed), bestow, bring (forth, hither), cast, cause, charge, come, commit, consider, count, [phrase] cry, deliver (up), direct, distribute, do, [idiom] doubtless, [idiom] without fail, fasten, frame, [idiom] get, give (forth, over, up), grant, hang (up), [idiom] have, [idiom] indeed, lay (unto charge, up), (give) leave, lend, let (out), [phrase] lie, lift up, make, [phrase] O that, occupy, offer, ordain, pay, perform, place, pour, print, [idiom] pull, put (forth), recompense, render, requite, restore, send (out), set (forth), shew, shoot forth (up), [phrase] sing, [phrase] slander, strike, (sub-) mit, suffer, [idiom] surely, [idiom] take, thrust, trade, turn, utter, [phrase] weep, [phrase] willingly, [phrase] withdraw, [phrase] would (to) God, yield.

derivation: from H3823 (לָבַב); used also like H3820 (לֵב)
strongs_def: the heart (as the most interior organ);
gloss: [phrase] bethink themselves, breast, comfortably, courage, ((faint), (tender-) heart(-ed), midst, mind, [idiom] unawares, understanding.

strongs_def: properly, the whole; hence, all, any or every (in the singular only, but often in a plural sense)
gloss: (in) all (manner, (ye)), altogether, any (manner), enough, every (one, place, thing), howsoever, as many as, (no-) thing, ought, whatsoever, (the) whole, whoso(-ever).

strongs_def: advice; by implication, plan; also prudence
gloss: advice, advisement, counsel(l-(or)), purpose.

strongs_def: to fill or (intransitively) be full of, in a wide application (literally and figuratively)
gloss: accomplish, confirm, [phrase] consecrate, be at an end, be expired, be fenced, fill, fulfil, (be, become, [idiom] draw, give in, go) full(-ly, -ly set, tale), (over-) flow, fulness, furnish, gather (selves, together), presume, replenish, satisfy, set, space, take a (hand-) full, [phrase] have wholly.

verses.english: We will rejoice in thy salvation, and in the name of our God we will set up our banners: the LORD fulfil all thy petitions.

strongs_def: properly, to creak (or emit a stridulous sound), i.e. to shout (usually for joy)
gloss: aloud for joy, cry out, be joyful (greatly, make to) rejoice, (cause to) shout (for joy), (cause to) sing (aloud, for joy, out), triumph.

strongs_def: something saved, i.e. (abstractly) deliverance; hence, aid, victory, prosperity
gloss: deliverance, health, help(-ing), salvation, save, saving (health), welfare.

derivation: a primitive word (perhaps rather from through the idea of definite and conspicuous position; compare H8064 (שָׁמַיִם));
strongs_def: an appellation, as amark or memorial of individuality; by implication honor, authority, character
gloss: [phrase] base, (in-) fame(-ous), named(-d), renown, report.

strongs_def: gods in the ordinary sense; but specifically used (in the plural thus, especially with the article) of the supreme God; occasionally applied by way of deference to magistrates; and sometimes as a superlative
gloss: angels, [idiom] exceeding, God (gods) (-dess, -ly), [idiom] (very) great, judges, [idiom] mighty.

strongs_def: to flaunt, i.e. raise a flag; figuratively, to be conspicuous
gloss: (set up, with) banners, chiefest.

strongs_def: to fill or (intransitively) be full of, in a wide application (literally and figuratively)
gloss: accomplish, confirm, [phrase] consecrate, be at an end, be expired, be fenced, fill, fulfil, (be, become, [idiom] draw, give in, go) full(-ly, -ly set, tale), (over-) flow, fulness, furnish, gather (selves, together), presume, replenish, satisfy, set, space, take a (hand-) full, [phrase] have wholly.

strongs_def: Jehovah, Jewish national name of God
gloss: Jehovah, the Lord. Compare H3050 (יָהּ), H3069 (יְהֹוִה).

strongs_def: properly, the whole; hence, all, any or every (in the singular only, but often in a plural sense)
gloss: (in) all (manner, (ye)), altogether, any (manner), enough, every (one, place, thing), howsoever, as many as, (no-) thing, ought, whatsoever, (the) whole, whoso(-ever).

strongs_def: a request
gloss: desire, petition.

verses.english: Now know I that the LORD saveth his anointed; he will hear him from his holy heaven with the saving strength of his right hand.

strongs_def: at this time, whether adverb, conjunction or expletive
gloss: henceforth, now, straightway, this time, whereas.

strongs_def: to know (properly, to ascertain by seeing); used in a great variety of senses, figuratively, literally, euphemistically and inferentially (including observation, care, recognition; and causatively, instruction, designation, punishment, etc.)
gloss: acknowledge, acquaintance(-ted with), advise, answer, appoint, assuredly, be aware, (un-) awares, can(-not), certainly, comprehend, consider, [idiom] could they, cunning, declare, be diligent, (can, cause to) discern, discover, endued with, familiar friend, famous, feel, can have, be (ig-) norant, instruct, kinsfolk, kinsman, (cause to let, make) know, (come to give, have, take) knowledge, have (knowledge), (be, make, make to be, make self) known, [phrase] be learned, [phrase] lie by man, mark, perceive, privy to, [idiom] prognosticator, regard, have respect, skilful, shew, can (man of) skill, be sure, of a surety, teach, (can) tell, understand, have (understanding), [idiom] will be, wist, wit, wot.

derivation: a primitive particle (the full form of the prepositional prefix) indicating causal relations of all kinds, antecedent or consequent;
strongs_def: (by implication) very widely used as a relative conjunction or adverb (as below); often largely modified by other particles annexed
gloss: and, + (forasmuch, inasmuch, where-) as, assured(-ly), + but, certainly, doubtless, + else, even, + except, for, how, (because, in, so, than) that, + nevertheless, now, rightly, seeing, since, surely, then, therefore, + (al-) though, + till, truly, + until, when, whether, while, whom, yea, yet.

strongs_def: properly, to be open, wide or free, i.e. (by implication) to be safe; causatively, to free or succor
gloss: [idiom] at all, avenging, defend, deliver(-er), help, preserve, rescue, be safe, bring (having) salvation, save(-iour), get victory.

strongs_def: Jehovah, Jewish national name of God
gloss: Jehovah, the Lord. Compare H3050 (יָהּ), H3069 (יְהֹוִה).

strongs_def: anointed; usually a consecrated person (as a king, priest, or saint); specifically, the Messiah
gloss: anointed, Messiah.

strongs_def: properly, to eye or (generally) to heed, i.e. pay attention; by implication, to respond; by extension to begin to speak; specifically to sing, shout, testify, announce
gloss: give account, afflict (by mistake for H6031 (עָנָה)), (cause to, give) answer, bring low (by mistake for H6031 (עָנָה)), cry, hear, Leannoth, lift up, say, [idiom] scholar, (give a) shout, sing (together by course), speak, testify, utter, (bear) witness. See also H1042 (בֵּית עֲנוֹת), H1043 (בֵּית עֲנָת).

derivation: dual of an unused singular שָׁמֶה; from an unused root meaning to be lofty;
strongs_def: the sky (as aloft; the dual perhaps alluding to the visible arch in which the clouds move, as well as to the higher ether where the celestial bodies revolve)
gloss: air, [idiom] astrologer, heaven(-s).

strongs_def: a sacred place or thing; rarely abstract, sanctity
gloss: consecrated (thing), dedicated (thing), hallowed (thing), holiness, ([idiom] most) holy ([idiom] day, portion, thing), saint, sanctuary.

derivation: feminine passive participle from the same as H1368 (גִּבּוֹר);
strongs_def: force (literally or figuratively); by implication, valor, victory
gloss: force, mastery, might, mighty (act, power), power, strength.

strongs_def: liberty, deliverance, prosperity
gloss: safety, salvation, saving.

strongs_def: the right hand or side (leg, eye) of a person or other object (as the stronger and more dexterous); locally, the south
gloss: [phrase] left-handed, right (hand, side), south.

verses.english: Some trust in chariots, and some in horses: but we will remember the name of the LORD our God.

strongs_def: these or those
gloss: an-(the) other; one sort, so, some, such, them, these (same), they, this, those, thus, which, who(-m).

strongs_def: a vehicle; by implication, a team; by extension, cavalry; by analogy a rider, i.e. the upper millstone
gloss: chariot, (upper) millstone, multitude (from the margin), wagon.

strongs_def: these or those
gloss: an-(the) other; one sort, so, some, such, them, these (same), they, this, those, thus, which, who(-m).

derivation: or סֻס; from an unused root meaning to skip (properly, for joy);
strongs_def: a horse (as leaping); also a swallow (from its rapid flight)
gloss: crane, horse (-back, -hoof). Compare H6571 (פָּרָשׁ).

strongs_def: we
gloss: ourselves, us, we.

derivation: a primitive word (perhaps rather from through the idea of definite and conspicuous position; compare H8064 (שָׁמַיִם));
strongs_def: an appellation, as amark or memorial of individuality; by implication honor, authority, character
gloss: [phrase] base, (in-) fame(-ous), named(-d), renown, report.

strongs_def: Jehovah, Jewish national name of God
gloss: Jehovah, the Lord. Compare H3050 (יָהּ), H3069 (יְהֹוִה).

strongs_def: gods in the ordinary sense; but specifically used (in the plural thus, especially with the article) of the supreme God; occasionally applied by way of deference to magistrates; and sometimes as a superlative
gloss: angels, [idiom] exceeding, God (gods) (-dess, -ly), [idiom] (very) great, judges, [idiom] mighty.

derivation: a primitive root; also as denominative from H2145 (זָכָר)
strongs_def: properly, to mark (so as to be recognized), i.e. to remember; by implication, to mention;  to be male
gloss: [idiom] burn (incense), [idiom] earnestly, be male, (make) mention (of), be mindful, recount, record(-er), remember, make to be remembered, bring (call, come, keep, put) to (in) remembrance, [idiom] still, think on, [idiom] well.

verses.english: They are brought down and fallen: but we are risen, and stand upright.

derivation: or (prolonged) הֵמָּה; masculine plural from H1981 (הֲלַךְ);
strongs_def: they (only used when emphatic)
gloss: it, like, [idiom] (how, so) many (soever, more as) they (be), (the) same, [idiom] so, [idiom] such, their, them, these, they, those, which, who, whom, withal, ye.

strongs_def: to bend the knee; by implication, to sink, to prostrate
gloss: bow (down, self), bring down (low), cast down, couch, fall, feeble, kneeling, sink, smite (stoop) down, subdue, [idiom] very.

strongs_def: to fall, in a great variety of applications (intransitive or causative, literal or figurative)
gloss: be accepted, cast (down, self, (lots), out), cease, die, divide (by lot), (let) fail, (cause to, let, make, ready to) fall (away, down, -en, -ing), fell(-ing), fugitive, have (inheritance), inferior, be judged (by mistake for H6419 (פָּלַל)), lay (along), (cause to) lie down, light (down), be ([idiom] hast) lost, lying, overthrow, overwhelm, perish, present(-ed, -ing), (make to) rot, slay, smite out, [idiom] surely, throw down.

strongs_def: we
gloss: ourselves, us, we.

strongs_def: to rise (in various applications, literal, figurative, intensive and causative)
gloss: abide, accomplish, [idiom] be clearer, confirm, continue, decree, [idiom] be dim, endure, [idiom] enemy, enjoin, get up, make good, help, hold, (help to) lift up (again), make, [idiom] but newly, ordain, perform, pitch, raise (up), rear (up), remain, (a-) rise (up) (again, against), rouse up, set (up), (e-) stablish, (make to) stand (up), stir up, strengthen, succeed, (as-, make) sure(-ly), (be) up(-hold, -rising).

strongs_def: to duplicate or repeat; by implication, to protest, testify (as by reiteration); intensively, to encompass, restore (as a sort of reduplication)
gloss: admonish, charge, earnestly, lift up, protest, call (take) to record, relieve, rob, solemnly, stand upright, testify, give warning, (bear, call to, give, take to) witness.

verses.english: Save, LORD: let the king hear us when we call.

strongs_def: Jehovah, Jewish national name of God
gloss: Jehovah, the Lord. Compare H3050 (יָהּ), H3069 (יְהֹוִה).

strongs_def: properly, to be open, wide or free, i.e. (by implication) to be safe; causatively, to free or succor
gloss: [idiom] at all, avenging, defend, deliver(-er), help, preserve, rescue, be safe, bring (having) salvation, save(-iour), get victory.

strongs_def: a king
gloss: king, royal.

strongs_def: properly, to eye or (generally) to heed, i.e. pay attention; by implication, to respond; by extension to begin to speak; specifically to sing, shout, testify, announce
gloss: give account, afflict (by mistake for H6031 (עָנָה)), (cause to, give) answer, bring low (by mistake for H6031 (עָנָה)), cry, hear, Leannoth, lift up, say, [idiom] scholar, (give a) shout, sing (together by course), speak, testify, utter, (bear) witness. See also H1042 (בֵּית עֲנוֹת), H1043 (בֵּית עֲנָת).

derivation: from an unused root meaning to be hot;
strongs_def: a day (as the warm hours), whether literal (from sunrise to sunset, or from one sunset to the next), or figurative (a space of time defined by an associated term), (often used adverb)
gloss: age, [phrase] always, [phrase] chronicals, continually(-ance), daily, ((birth-), each, to) day, (now a, two) days (agone), [phrase] elder, [idiom] end, [phrase] evening, [phrase] (for) ever(-lasting, -more), [idiom] full, life, as (so) long as (... live), (even) now, [phrase] old, [phrase] outlived, [phrase] perpetually, presently, [phrase] remaineth, [idiom] required, season, [idiom] since, space, then, (process of) time, [phrase] as at other times, [phrase] in trouble, weather, (as) when, (a, the, within a) while (that), [idiom] whole ([phrase] age), (full) year(-ly), [phrase] younger.

derivation: a primitive root (rather identical with H7122 (קָרָא) through the idea of accosting a person met);
strongs_def: to call out to (i.e. properly, address by name, but used in a wide variety of applications)
gloss: bewray (self), that are bidden, call (for, forth, self, upon), cry (unto), (be) famous, guest, invite, mention, (give) name, preach, (make) proclaim(-ation), pronounce, publish, read, renowned, say.
